channel.title: Night Witches: 1942
channel.description:
*Night Witches: 1942*
The Great Patriotic War marches on! The Nazis are figuring out how to respond to your attacks, and this series will see a transition from the harsh but manageable conditions at TRUD GORNYKA to the mud-soaked meat grinder of PASHKOVSKAYA.
This is the third series in a run spanning the entire war! Players may bring characters forward from any previous session, or create a new PC.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LerpOsa0_Y3d3h6Y4AS [date=2019-07-02 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-02 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LerpZcrjgQK9FriyE8s [date=2019-07-09 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-09 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LerpoaTYDzDE9QFpsjD [date=2019-07-16 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-16 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LerpvtznfcMAXcDli80 [date=2019-07-23 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-23 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lerq0uUCbCj1r_bzpPH [date=2019-07-30 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-30 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
